channel.title: I have some questions! Help
channel.description:
[u][b]Starting Location[/b][/u] How, or where do I go to change this? I want it to be different, so when newcomers log in, they're at that spot. I need to know this, because I want it changed.
[u][b]Doors[/b][/u] Is there a way I can make doors be able to be opened?
[u][b]Portals[/b][/u] How do I make portals? And how do I make them teleport you somewhere?
Thanks in advance, Incognito
